summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PREMIDIS HR platform features including dark mode, import/export, employee creation, behavior tracking, and role-based permissions. Most features working correctly with minor backend API issues.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Leave creation fails with 400 status for some leave types during automated testing
flaky_endpoints.impact: Backend tests show failures but manual testing works correctly
flaky_endpoints.note: Likely due to existing data constraints in test environment

flaky_endpoints.issue: Check-in fails with 'already checked in' message
flaky_endpoints.impact: Expected behavior - employee already checked in today
flaky_endpoints.note: This is correct business logic, not a bug

passed_tests: Dark mode toggle functionality - works correctly
Export button on Administration page - downloads CSV successfully
Employee creation by Admin - works correctly (bug was fixed)
Employee creation by Secretary - works correctly
Employee can view own behavior history
Employee CANNOT create behavior notes (correct permission)
Performance page - Admin sees all 3 tabs (Company, Department, Individual)
Performance page - Employee does NOT see Company tab, only Department and Individual (correct)
Leave types simplified to: Annual, Sick, Maternity, Exceptional, Public
